h3.a: Penn Manor senior prom cancelled; commencement shifts to virtual format

div.p: The Penn Manor High School senior prom will not be held this year because the venue for the event, Eden Resort & Conference Center, has cancelled all large gatherings at its facilities through the end of May. The 2020 prom was scheduled to be held at the Eden on May 8. In lieu of the […]

h3.a: School board to host virtual meeting Monday, April 20

div.p: Due to the disaster emergency declaration by Governor Wolf and to safeguard the school community, the Penn Manor School District Board of Directors will hold a virtual school board meeting on Monday, April 20. A public budget workshop will begin at 6:15 p.m., and the board’s committee of the whole meeting will begin at 7 […]

h3.a: Schools now closed for the year

div.p: Gov. Wolf has announced that all schools in the state will remain closed through the current school year. Remote learning will continue throughout the school year, based on the district calendar. The last day of school is May 29. You can find updates on the closure here. Penn Manor has introduced a Continuity of Education […]

h3.a: Penn Manor introduces Continuity of Education plan

div.p: Penn Manor has introduced a comprehensive Continuity of Education plan, which is available for viewing here on the district’s remote learning website. The plan explains in detail how teachers will provide learning activities for all students to access by grade level or subject area. The current level of activities will continue through April 9, and […]

p.strong: A better community … one student at a time.

div.p:
Penn Manor School District
P.O. Box 1001
Millersville, PA 17551
The Penn Manor community will work collaboratively to help students define and achieve their academic and life goals.
